channel.title: EastCraft 1.4.6 - New Server - Needs Players!
channel.description:
Hello, this is my first post, so I wont be all good with advertisements, but i hope you will join! Fun Facts!: This server is PORTFORWARDED! *hooray!* Up most of the time (40-50% Uptime on weekdays, %80-100 on weekends :)) Needs Players... :) ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ This server has alot of benefits, ALL griefs are rolled back, and has a strong internet connection! The staff list is: Main Owner: Me (Shock) 2nd Owner: D3monOwn3r Co-owner: superrogiebear Head Admin: simon_bibby Admin: IMinecrafter99 Moderator: Zaviator
We currently AREN'T looking for staff, Sorry to those staff hunters out there :P
We are friendly and kind, and are helpful! The ip is: 90.220.108.217
Hope to see you ingame! ~Shock (Advertisement will be updated soon!) [img]http://mcservers.org/images/90.220.108.217/600x100_04.jpg[/img]
